lead_paragraph: Tairia Flowers homered and Cat Osterman allowed only three hits as the United States defeated Japan, 3-0, in the World Cup of Softball championship game in Oklahoma City last night. It was the Americans’ 22nd victory in a row and second consecutive World Cup title.
